Class Game

java.lang.Object
am.aua.StrategyGame.core.Game
public class Game extends Object
Core Game controller that manages two countries and handles game logic such as saving, battles, and gold cycles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(String saveFile)
    Loads a saved game from a file.
    Game(String name1, String name2)
    Creates a new game with two countries using the given player names.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Country
    getCountry1()
    Returns the first country.
    Country
    getCountry2()
    Returns the second country.
    String
    getWinner()
    Returns the name of the winning country, or null if the game is not over yet.
    boolean
    isGameOver()
    Checks if the game is over (if one country's HP is 0 or less).
    void
    nextCycle()
    Runs the next game cycle where both countries earn gold.
    void
    resolveBattle()
    Resolves a battle between the two countries.
    void
    saveGame(String filename)
    Saves the current game state to a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String name1, String name2)
      Creates a new game with two countries using the given player names.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first country
      name2 - the name of the second country

    • Game

      public Game(String saveFile) throws IOException
      Loads a saved game from a file.
      Parameters:
      saveFile - the file to load the game from
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the file fails

    • getCountry1

      public Country getCountry1()
      Returns the first country.
      Returns:
      country1

    • getCountry2

      public Country getCountry2()
      Returns the second country.
      Returns:
      country2

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over (if one country's HP is 0 or less).
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • getWinner

      public String getWinner()
      Returns the name of the winning country, or null if the game is not over yet.
      Returns:
      winner's name or null

    • nextCycle

      public void nextCycle()
      Runs the next game cycle where both countries earn gold.

    • resolveBattle

      public void resolveBattle()
      Resolves a battle between the two countries. The attacker and defender are handled inside the battle logic.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String filename) throws IOException
      Saves the current game state to a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to save to
      Throws:
      IOException - if saving fails
